|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 880 |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q128C; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB256M16BP-D1; |stockos = Linux;3.10.14;OpenWrt (MediaTek SDK); |exp_if_types = SATA 3.0, USB 3.0, Micro SD card slot |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,,debug |jtag = yes,,debug |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 2-port PCI SATA Serial ATA Controller;ASMedia;ASM1061;;1;,,, CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.200.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = |defaultssid = mt7602e-0000, mt7612e-0000 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, LEDE Project, Padavan (unofficially) |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2019 |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 09/11/2015 |estprice = 89 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7602EN; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The board uses [[MediaTek_MT7621A|MT7621A]] high performance router SoC, supports open source OpenWrt OS.
The board's dimension is relatively small 16cm x 10cm, about three credit cards in a row. ''256MB RAM'' version is also available for $79. '''Note''': According to the [http://ftp.mqmaker.com/WiTi/Docs/Hardware/MQ.pdf PCB text] original '''WiTi''' board shipped have a 2.0 revision. :Don't mess with an upcoming '''WiTi2''' board. ===Key features=== :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek_MT7621A|MT7621A]] Dual-Core @880MHz (4 threads) :RAM: 256MB or 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 16MB (SPI NOR) :2.4GHz WiFi (supports 802.11b/g/n, up to 300Mbps) :5GHz WiFi (supports 802.11a/n/ac, up to 867Mbps) :Gigabit WAN port x2, Gigabit LAN port x4 :SATA 3.0 x2 (supports 3.5 inch HDD) :USB 3.0 x1, microSD x1, RTC battery for storage application :30-pin Expansion Ports (including USB, I2S, JTAG, UART, GPIO) :4-pins serial debug port, RF Antenna Connector x4 :Power LED x1, SATA LED x 1, WiFi LED x 2, LAN LED x4 :WPS/GPIO Key x1, Reset Key x1 ==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/mqmaker/witi ''MQmaker WiTi Board'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :See also [https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/witi-board-open-extensible-router-nas-platform ''IndieGOGO'' campaign] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/12/witi-openwrt-router-board-features-6-ethernet-ports-dual-band-wifi-sata-and-usb-3-0-ports-crowdfunding/ ''MQmaker WiTi Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/14/witi-router-board-powered-by-MediaTek-mt7621a-soc-now-sells-for-79/ ''WiTi Router Board Powered'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.mqmaker.com/ Official support board] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=59092 '''OpenWrt''' board thread] *[https://forum.mqmaker.com/t/how-to-connect-usb-to-serial-uart/140 ''UART'' on '''WiTi''' forum thread] *[https://forum.mqmaker.com/t/alternative-openwrt-mtksdk-build-for-witi-board-wip/272 ''OpenWrt FW'' on '''WiTi''' forums] ===Documentation=== *[http://ftp.mqmaker.com/WiTi/Docs/Hardware/MQ-WiTi-Board.pdf Board schematics] *[http://ftp.mqmaker.com/WiTi/Docs/Hardware/MQ.pdf Board layout]
